title: Slow Cooker Beef Pot Roast
directions: Pat beef dry with paper towels. Sprinkle generously with salt and pepper all over.
Heat oil in a skillet over high heat. Brown aggressively all over - a deep dark brown crust is essential for flavour base! Should take about 7 minutes.
In the same skillet, add onion and garlic. Cook for 2 minutes until onion is browned.
Add wine, reduce by half. Transfer to slow cooker.
Mix together flour and about 1 cup of the broth. Lumps is fine. Pour into slow cooker.
Add remaining broth, carrots, celery, rosemary and thyme into slow cooker.
Cover and cook on LOW for 5 hours or pressure cook for 45 minutes on HIGH.
Add potato, cook on LOW for 3 hours or pressure cook for 10 minutes on HIGH. (Note 3)
Remove beef. Rest for 5 minutes, then slice thickly.
Adjust salt and pepper of Sauce to taste. Serve beef with vegetables and plenty of sauce!
ingredients: 5 carrots , peeled and cut into 2.5cm/1" pieces
3 celery stalks , cut into 4 cm / 1.5" pieces
3 cups / 750 ml beef broth , salt reduced
750 g - 1 kg / 3 - 4 lb potatoes , peeled and cut into 2.5 cm / 1" pieces
